briefdescription.para: accessor for the default storage type definition

detaileddescription.para: create a new current request state and init it, delete the old one if exist
parse a surl to check the validity

briefdescription.para: execute a srmv2 request async "GET" on the srm_ifce
launch a surls-> turls translation in asynchronous mode

parameterdescription.para: : GList of string of the differents surls to convert

simplesect.para: return positive if success else -1, check GError for more information

detaileddescription.para:
convert a table a struct srmv2_pinfilestatus to (a) desired GList(s) of turl string, turl associated error code, turl associated error string
return the number of turl in the last request
turls
pointer GList<char*> for the GList turl, need to be free. A empty turl (error case) cause an addition of a NULL pointer to the LIST. turls must be set to NULL if not used.
turls_code
pointer GList<int> for the GList error code associated to the turls, need to be free. turls_errcode must be set to NULL if not used
turls_errstring
GList<char*> pointer for the GList error string associated to the turls, need to free . A empty turl (error case) cause an addition of a NULL pointer to the LIST. turls_errstring must be set to NULL if not used.
err
: global GError system
convert a srm_ifce result to the handle, update the last request info
obtain the statut in the case of a srmv2 protocol request

simplesect.para: return TRUE if the current request is finished else FALSE

briefdescription.para: get the result to the last get_async request

simplesect.para: return the number of response in turls or negative value if error

parameterdescription.para: turls : GList<char*> turls with the full list of answer, an answer with error is a NULL pointer

simplesect.para: turls need to be free manually

briefdescription.para: get the error string of each request

parameterdescription.para: : GList<char*>, give a string error for each turl request, char* can be NULL if no error associated

simplesect.para: return number of request turl if success else return negative value

detaileddescription.para: convert the results in a struct gfal_srm_result struct

parameterdescription.para: : struct gfal_srm_result*, give a table of a struct gfal_srm_result

simplesect.para: return number of results in table if success else return negative value

parameterdescription.para: : maximum time to wait before error

simplesect.para: return 0 if finished correctly, return -1 if timeout is reached or if error ( err is set )

parameterdescription.para: : GList<int> of all the errcode associated with the request

simplesect.para: return number of request turl if success else return negative value
